content: crochet top sweetie design martina taborsky www fashionmartina cz finished size 36/38 40/42 t m bust 86-90 cm 90 96 cm the finished garment is stretchy so it could be a little more yarn 5 6 balls of 100% mercerized cotton 136 yd/125 m/50 g the original one is catania from schachenmayer hook nr 3 structural pattern 13 + 1 stitches the 1 4 row repeat 1 x and then always repeat the 3 and 4 row 1 row chain 1 single_crochet in the second chain from the hook single_crochet across 2 row chain 3 count as the first double_crochet turn 2 double_crochet in next 2 st chain 3 skip 2 st single_crochet in the next st 5 double_crochet in the next st single_crochet in the next single_crochet skip 2 st 3 double_crochet in next 3 st 3 row chain 2 count as the first back post double_crochet turn 2 back post double_crochet in the next 2 double_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in the third of double_crochet of the previous row chain 3 3 back post double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet of the previous row 4 row chain 3 count as the first double_crochet turn 2 double_crochet in the next 2 double_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in the third chain 5 double_crochet in single_crochet single_crochet in the first chain chain 3 3 double_crochet in the next 3 double_crochet gauge for structural pattern 23 stitches and 12 row = 10 x 10 cm basic pattern double_crochet gauge for basic pattern 20 stitches and 13 5 row = 10 x 10 cm this top could be very simply and easily modified in the size if you add or reduce 2 pattern repeats = 26 stitches and if you wish to have the top longer then you have to make longer the upper part in structural pattern the top is worked till armholes in one piece in rounds then it is divided and front and back is worked separately back + front cast on on 182/208 chain and taking care not to twist sts join slip_stitch in first chain to form a ring then work the structural pattern = 14 repeats of the pattern till the piece is 20 / 22 cm long then we continue in basic pattern = double_crochet across and in the first row of the basic pattern we reduce 28 / 32 stitches =double_crochet in every double_crochet and single_crochet of the previous row and 2 double_crochet in every chain-3 space of the previous row = 154 / 176 double_crochet continue in basic pattern till the piece ist 32/35 cm long and then separate the work in 2 pieces = front and back = 77 / 88 double_crochet from now we work in normal row with turning of the work shape armholes 1 row chain 1 turn slip_stitch in first 6 sts chain 3 double_crochet in each st across to the last 6 st leave this rem 6 st unworked 2 row chain 1 turn sl st in first 3 sts chain
